long_description: we're pioneering a sleep movement. with expert guidance from renowned harley street practitioners, osteopaths, chiropractors, physiotherapists and sleep apnoea consultants, we've designed an unrivalled, problem-solving range of specialist sleep solutions targeting the most common sleep problems. as the uk's leading sleep specialist, w e want to help you understand the triggers to your sleep problem and guide you in finding the right sleep solution, so you don't have to lie awake compromising on your kip. whatever is stopping you from sleeping, we'll have just the solution you need to help you sleep comfortably. we have a range products designed to ease full body, neck, shoulder, back, hip and knee pains, as well as muscular aches. with expert design guidance we've curated a highly versatile pregnancy pillow range, which includes a variety of premium body pillows that offer superior comfort and support throughout all trimesters and beyond. longing for a peaceful night's sleep. well look no further, we offer anti-snore sleep solutions proven by the british sleep apnoea association to reduce snoring frequency and volume by approximately 60%.

generated_description: kally sleep, legally known as sleep solutions limited, is a company based in london, england, specializing in innovative sleep solutions. the company collaborates with renowned health experts, including harley street practitioners, osteopaths, chiropractors, physiotherapists, and sleep apnea consultants, to develop a range of products aimed at addressing common sleep problems. their product categories include body pillows, pillows, mattress toppers, pillowcases, and accessories designed to alleviate joint pain, snoring, temperature regulation, and acid reflux. kally sleep's offerings are available through leading uk retailers such as john lewis, m&s, next, boots, very, and mamas and papas. the company is known for its problem-solving approach and commitment to quality and customer service.
